novice_hint: HAPI runs JQL and returns Issue objects you can iterate. Start with a narrow filter, then add clauses.
expert_hint: Keep searches index-friendly. Restrict date ranges and sort on indexed fields. Stream results when possible.
expert_snippet: Issues.search("project = DEMO AND status IN (\"In Progress\", \"Blocked\") AND updated >= -7d ORDER BY updated DESC").each { it -> /* act */ }
feed_novice: Tip: quote multi-word values and add ORDER BY to stabilise results.
feed_expert: Prefer IN over long OR chains. Validate performance in large projects.
sidebar_novice: HAPI search returns Issue objects. Use simple JQL, then iterate.
sidebar_expert: Performance: narrow scope, avoid wildcards, prefer indexed sorts, test on prod-like data.
